link.title: Covid-19 Response
link.script:

SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ var b=function(){this.c=""};b.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeScript{"+this.c+"}"};b.prototype.a=function(a){this.c=a};(new b).a("");var c=function(){this.g=""};c.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyle{"+this.g+"}"};c.prototype.a=function(a){this.g=a};(new c).a("");var d=function(){this.f=""};d.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyleSheet{"+this.f+"}"};d.prototype.a=function(a){this.f=a};(new d).a("");var e=function(){this.b=""};e.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeHtml{"+this.b+"}"};e.prototype.a=function(a){this.b=a};(new e).a("");(new e).a("");(new e).a("
");}).call(this);

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Breakfast and lunch will be available for pick up at Westminster Community Charter School between the hours of 11:00am and 1:00pm Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from March 18th through Thursday, April 9th. These grab-and-go style meals will be distributed in the bus loop located on Westminster Avenue.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: Our partners at Kaleida Health have created a website with many resources and information about staying healthy during this time of social distancing. They also have information about how to talk to your children about this difficult time, and what agencies you can reach out to if you or your children are having difficulties coping with our current situation. Please visit their website and take advantage of the information and services available.
